title: Wedding Guests Angry At Sunrise Wedding + Would Bobby Adopt? + Miranda Lambert Sends Amy A Gift
itunes:title: Wedding Guests Angry At Sunrise Wedding + Would Bobby Adopt? + Miranda Lambert Sends Amy A Gift
description:
We answer some of our most frequently asked text messages including if Bobby would ever plan on adopting. A couple had their wedding start at 5am so they could have a sunrise wedding. Miranda Lambert sent Amy a special gift after she stopped by the show on Friday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
